column2: "Asɛm a ɔbaa Jeremia hɔ wɔ Jewfo nyina a wɔtse Egypt asaase do a wɔtsetse Migidɔl
column4: na Nof
column5: na Patros asaase do no ho
column8: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE Israel Nyankopɔn no se nye yi: Hom ehu mbusu a medze maba Jerusalɛm do nyina
column9: na Juda nkurow nyinara do; na

column2: "osian hɔn emumuyɛ a wɔayɛ dze eyi me ebufuw ntsi
column4: na wɔkɔsoom abosom afofor a hom nnyim hɔn ntsi
column5: hɔn o

column2: "Naaso mosomaa mo nkowaa nkɔnhyɛfo no nyinara baa hom nkyɛn
column4: dɛ
column5: Ao
column6: mma hom nnyɛ ekyiwadze a mikyir no."

column2: "Na woenntsie
column3: eso wɔammbrɛ hɔn aso adze dɛ wɔbɛsan efi hɔn emumuyɛ ho
column4: dɛ wɔnnkɛhyew nduhuam ama abosom afofor."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na m’ebufuhyew na m’ebufuw huei gui
column3: na ɔdzɛwee wɔ Juda nkurow na Jerusalɛm abrɔn mu; ma ayeyɛ ekurofo na amamfo
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei mbrɛ EWURADZE
column4: Israel Nyankopɔn no se nye yi: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom bɔ mbusu yi tsia homankasa hom akra
column5: dɛ hom botwitwa hom mu ɔbarimba na ɔbaa
column6: abɔdomaba na enumfoanoba efi Juda mu
column7: dɛ mma wonngyaa hom nkaa bi;"

column2: "wɔ dɛ hom dze hom nsaano edwuma yi me ebufuw
column3: dɛ hom rehyew nduhuam ama abosom afofor wɔ Egypt asaase a hom akɔ do akɛyɛ amamforafo wɔ hɔ no do; ama woeekuruw hom ase
column4: na hom aayɛ ndom na ahorohoraadze wɔ asaase do amanaman nyinara mu?"

column2: "Ana hom werɛ efir hom egyanom emumuyɛ na Juda ahemfo emumuyɛ
column4: homankasa hom emumuyɛ
column5: na hom yernom emumuyɛ a wɔyɛɛ no Juda asaase do

column2: "Wɔmmbrɛɛ hɔnho adze ara dze bodu ndɛ da yi mpo
column4: eso wɔnnantseew me mbra
column5: anaa m’ahyɛdze a medze mesi hom enyim

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no se nye yi: Hwɛ
column4: medze m’enyi bɛsa hom do
column5: ma aayɛ hom mbusu
column6: mekyerɛ dɛ wobokuruw Juda nyinara ase."

column2: "Na mebɛfa Juda nkaase a wɔdze esi hɔn enyim dɛ wɔbɔkɔ Egypt asaase do akɛyɛ amamforafo wɔ hɔ no
column3: na hɔn nyinara wɔasa: Egypt asaase do na wɔbɔtotɔ; wɔbɛhyew wɔ afona na ɔkɔm ano; wobowuwu
column4: ofi ekumaba do kesi ɔkɛse do
column5: wɔ afona na ɔkɔm ano: na wɔbɛyɛ ekyiwadze

column2: "Na mebɛtsea hɔn a wɔtse Egypt asaase do no
column4: ɔkɔm
column5: na ɔyardɔm matsea Jerusalɛm no:"

column2: "na Juda nkaase a wɔkɔ Egypt aakɛyɛ hɔ amamforafo
column3: no mu obi rimmfi nsa anaaso ɔnnka
column4: dɛ wɔbɛsan aba Juda asaase a hom enya akɔndɔ dɛ hom bɛtsena do: na obiara rennsan
column5: gyedɛ hɔn a wobefi nsa no."

column2: "Nna mbarimba no a wonyim dɛ hɔn yernom hyeew eduhuam maa abosom afofor bi no
column3: na mbaa a wogyinagyina nkyɛn no nyina
column4: kuw kɛse pa a
column5: mekyerɛ nkorɔfo a wɔtse Egypt asaase do
column10: "Ɔfa asɛm a aka akyerɛ hɛn wɔ EWURADZE dzin mu no dze

column2: "Na mbom ɔyɛ ara na yɛbɛyɛ asɛm biara a oefi hɛn anomu efir
column3: dɛ yɛbɛhyew eduhuam ama ɔsor ɔhembaa no
column4: na yɛabɔ ɔnom afɔr ama no
column5: dɛ mbrɛ hɛn na hɛn egyanom
column8: na Jerusalɛm abrɔn mu: na ber no na yenyaa edziban bafuu

column2: "Na ofitsi ber a yegyaa dɛ yɛhyew eduhuam ma ɔsor ɔhembaa
column3: na yɛbɔ ɔnom afɔr ma no no
column4: adze nyina abɔ hɛn
column5: na yeewie sa wɔ afona na ɔkɔm ano."

column2: "Na yɛhyeew eduhuam maa ɔsor ɔhembaa
column3: na yɛbɔɔ ɔnom afɔr maa no no
column4: aso yɛyɛɛ tatar maa no dɛ yɛdze rosɔr no
column5: na yekwetsir hɛn kunnom bɔɔ ɔnom afɔr maa no?"

column2: "Nna Jeremia see ɔman no nyina
column4: na mbaa
column5: mekyerɛ nkorɔfo a wobuaa no no nyina

column2: "Ma dɛm no EWURADZE enntum annsɔw bio
column4: na ekyiwadze a hom ayɛ no ntsi; dɛm ntsi na hom asaase adan amamfo
column5: na ahobowdze
column6: na ndom a obiara nnyi mu dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Osiandɛ hom ahyew eduhuam
column3: na osiandɛ hom ayɛ bɔn etsia EWURADZE
column4: na hom enntsie EWURADZE ne ndze
column5: eso wɔannantsew ne mbra
column7: na n’adasesɛm do ntsi; dɛm ntsi na mbusu yi ato hom dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Bio so Jeremia see ɔman no nyina
column4: Juda a hom wɔ Egypt asaase do nyina
column5: hom ntsie EWURADZE n’asɛm:"

column2: "mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no se nye yi
column4: dɛ: Hom na hom yernom dze hom ano aka
column5: na hom dze hom nsa ahyɛ no ma
column7: Ɔba ara na yɛbɛma hɛn nsuaa a yesuae no aba mu
column8: dɛ yɛbɛhyew eduhuam ama ɔsor ɔhembaa no
column9: na yɛabɔ ɔnom afɔr ama no: hom mma hom nsuaa ntsim
column10: na hom mma hom nsuaa mbra mu ɛ."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom Judafo a hom tse Egypt asaase do nyina
column4: maka me dzin kɛse no ho ntam
column5: EWURADZE na ɔse
column6: dɛ wɔnnkɔbɔ me dzin bio wɔ Judanyi biara anomu wɔ Egypt asaase nyinara do
column8: Dɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn tse ase yi:"

column2: "Hwɛ
column4: na nnyɛ papa a: na Juda mbarimba a wɔwɔ Egypt asaase do nyinara bɛhyew afona na ɔkɔm ano
column5: dze ekodu dɛ woewie sa."

column2: "Na hɔn a wofi afona nsa no
column4: hɔn dodow kumaabi
column5: na Juda nkaa a wɔkɔ Egypt asaase do akɛyɛ amamforafo wɔ hɔ no nyina

column2: "Na iyi bɛyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze ama hom
column4: dɛ mebɛtsea hom bea yi do ha
column5: ama hom eehu dɛ me nsɛm begyina ara ampa ayɛ mbusu etsia hom:"

column2: "mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Hwɛ
column3: medze Egypthen Farao Hofra bɛhyɛ n’atamfo nsa; dɛ mbrɛ medze Judahen Zedekia mehyɛɛ ne tamfo
column4: na nyia ɔhwehwɛɛ no nkwa
column5: Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar no
